#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int temp;
        cin>>temp;
        if(temp==2)
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
          else{
        if( (temp-1)%4 == 0)
           cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        }
        }



    return 0;
}
